title: Initialize Git Monorepo and Scaffold Projects
description: Set up the Git repository with a monorepo structure. Create 'mobile', 'web', and 'backend' directories. Scaffold new Flutter projects and initialize a new Firebase project with TypeScript functions.
sprint_goal: Establish foundational infrastructure, CI/CD, and core user authentication.
acceptance_criteria: A Git repository exists with 'mobile', 'web', 'backend' directories; Flutter and Firebase projects are scaffolded.
definition_of_done: Initial commit pushed to the Git repository with the correct project structure; Code reviewed.
business_value: Creates the repository structure needed before any code can be written.

title: Admin registers a new organization tenant
description: As a new administrator, I want to register my organization by providing my details, a unique organization name, and selecting a data residency region, so that a new, isolated tenant is created for my company and I can begin configuring the system.
sprint_goal: Establish foundational infrastructure, CI/CD, and core user authentication.
acceptance_criteria: A new tenant and user are created atomically; Custom claims for tenantId and role are set; User is auto-logged in and redirected to the Admin dashboard.
definition_of_done: All acceptance criteria validated; Unit and Integration tests passing with >80% coverage; Security requirements validated; Deployed and verified in staging.
deployment_notes: Deploys a new Cloud Function and Flutter for Web page.
business_value: Enables new organizations to onboard themselves, creating the foundational tenant structure.

title: CI/CD: Develop Backend Deployment Workflow
description: Create the `backend-deploy.yml` GitHub Actions workflow. This workflow will trigger on pushes to `develop` (for staging) and `main` (for prod). It will install dependencies, lint, run all Jest tests, check for 80% code coverage, and deploy using the Firebase CLI.
sprint_goal: Establish foundational infrastructure, CI/CD, and core user authentication.
acceptance_criteria: A push to `develop` branch automatically deploys the backend to staging; Workflow fails if tests or coverage checks fail.
definition_of_done: Workflow runs successfully in GitHub Actions for both PRs and pushes to `develop`.
testing_requirements: Triggering workflow via pull requests and direct pushes to test branches.
deployment_notes: Defines the deployment process for all backend services.
business_value: Increases development velocity and reduces deployment risk by automating the backend release lifecycle.

title: Admin invites a new user to the organization via email
description: As an Admin, I want to invite new employees by entering their email and role, so they can receive a secure registration link and create their account.
sprint_goal: Implement the complete user invitation and account activation workflow.
acceptance_criteria: Admin can invite a user; User document created with 'invited' status; Email is sent with a 24-hour link; Duplicate invites are blocked.
definition_of_done: All acceptance criteria validated; Integration testing of UI, Cloud Function, and email sending completed; Deployed and verified in staging.
testing_requirements: Unit, Integration, E2E, Email delivery testing
deployment_notes: Deploys a new Cloud Function and a new modal in the Admin UI.
business_value: Enables onboarding of new employees, facilitating organizational growth.

title: Subordinate checks in for attendance
description: As a Subordinate, I want to tap a 'Check-In' button on my mobile app so that the system captures my current time and GPS location to create an official attendance record for the start of my workday.
sprint_goal: Deliver the core attendance marking functionality for Subordinates, including online and offline check-in/out.
acceptance_criteria: User can check-in online, capturing timestamp and GPS; Check-in fails gracefully if location permission is denied; Check-in works offline and saves to local cache.
definition_of_done: All ACs validated; E2E tests for offline and permission flows passing; Performance requirements met; Security rules deployed and tested.
testing_requirements: Unit, Widget, Integration, E2E on physical devices
deployment_notes: Key feature for the mobile application.
business_value: Provides the foundational data point for all attendance tracking, reporting, and approval workflows.

title: Supervisor views pending attendance records from subordinates
description: As a Supervisor, I want to see a clear list of all attendance records from my direct subordinates that are awaiting my review, so that I can efficiently manage my team's attendance.
sprint_goal: Enable the core Supervisor workflow: view, approve, and reject subordinate attendance.
acceptance_criteria: Supervisor sees a real-time list of 'pending' records; List only contains records from direct subordinates; List shows key details (name, date, times).
definition_of_done: All ACs validated; Firestore Security Rules tested for data scoping; Required composite index is defined; Performance requirements met.
testing_requirements: Unit, Widget, Integration, Security Rule testing
deployment_notes: Introduces the main dashboard for the Supervisor role.
business_value: Enables the core attendance approval workflow, ensuring employee work hours are verified in a timely manner.

title: Admin deactivates a user's account
description: As an Admin, I want to deactivate a user's account and be guided through any necessary reassignments, so that I can securely revoke access for departing employees.
sprint_goal: Build out core Admin user and team management capabilities, including deactivation and hierarchy management.
acceptance_criteria: Admin can deactivate a non-supervisor user; Deactivated user is prevented from logging in; Admin is blocked from deactivating a Supervisor with active subordinates.
definition_of_done: All ACs validated; Integration test for full flow complete; Security requirement for session invalidation verified; Audit log entry created.
deployment_notes: Deploys a critical security function for offboarding.
business_value: Enhances security by preventing unauthorized access from former employees.

title: Subordinate requests a correction to an attendance record
description: As a Subordinate, I want to submit a request to correct my attendance record and provide a mandatory reason, so I can fix mistakes and ensure my work hours are accurate.
sprint_goal: Implement the end-to-end attendance correction workflow for Subordinates and Supervisors.
acceptance_criteria: User can submit a valid correction request; Record status changes to 'correction_pending'; Request is blocked without a valid justification.
definition_of_done: All ACs validated; Integration tests for Firestore writes and security rules completed; Security requirements validated via emulator tests.
deployment_notes: Adds a key self-service feature for users.
business_value: Ensures data integrity by providing a formal, auditable workflow for correcting attendance errors.

title: Admin views the audit log of data changes
description: As an Admin, I want to view a filterable and immutable audit log of all critical system actions, so that I can ensure compliance, maintain accountability for data changes, and troubleshoot issues.
sprint_goal: Establish the Audit Log for compliance and complete Admin management features.
acceptance_criteria: Admin can view a paginated, reverse-chronological audit log; Admin can filter by date, actor, and action type; The log is immutable from the UI.
definition_of_done: All ACs validated; Firestore Security Rules for immutability tested; Required composite indexes defined and deployed; Performance requirements for filtering verified.
deployment_notes: Key compliance feature for enterprise customers.
business_value: Provides a trustworthy record for audits, enhances accountability, and aids in troubleshooting.

title: Admin views summary attendance reports on the web dashboard
description: As an Admin, I want to view aggregated summary reports of attendance for daily, weekly, and monthly periods on my web dashboard, so that I can quickly assess workforce attendance trends.
sprint_goal: Deliver the initial suite of Admin reports, including summary, filtering, late/early, and exception reports.
acceptance_criteria: Admin can view daily, weekly, and monthly summaries; Reports show present/absent counts and attendance %; Trend charts visualize data over time.
definition_of_done: All ACs validated; Performance requirements verified against a large dataset; Security rules for tenant isolation tested.
business_value: Provides immediate, actionable insights into workforce attendance, enabling efficient monitoring and trend analysis.
